titleStmt.title: Gods goodnes and mercy Layd open in a sermon, preached at Pauls-Crosse on the last of Iune. 1622. By Mr Robert Harris, pastour of the church of God in Hanvvell in Oxfordshire.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Davvson for Iohn Bartlet, and are to be sold at the Guilt Cup in the Gold-smiths Row in Cheap-side,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Guilt Cup in the Gold-smiths Row in Cheap-side
